docs.snippet: North Korea is seeking a peace treaty with the United States, China and South Korea to formally end the Korean War and will not stop its nuclear tests until it gets one, a person who relayed that message from North Korea to China told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korea is seeking a peace treaty with the United States, China and South Korea to formally end the Korean War and will not stop its nuclear tests until it gets one, a person who relayed that message from North Korea to China told Reuters.

headline.main: North Korea Seeks China Help on Treaty With U.S., or More Tests: Source
headline.print_headline: North Korea Seeks China Help on Treaty With U.S., or More Tests: Source
